sourcesContent:
import image1 from '../../../assets/images/IMG_globalpartnership.jpg';
import image2 from '../../../assets/images/IMG_athleteperformance.jpg';
import image3 from '../../../assets/images/IMG_executivesuppport.jpg';
import image4 from '../../../assets/images/IMG_teamandorganisation.jpg';


const SERVICES_DATA = [
    {
        title: 'GLOBAL PARTNERSHIP',
        paragraph1: 'Our global partnership formula is exclusive for organisations and athletes.',
        paragraph2: 'The goal of this formula is to offer our partners an innovative solution entirely dedicated to\n' +
            'their career development plan.',
        paragraph3: 'Our training programs are adapted to the needs and demands of the team organisation,\n' +
            'staff and athletes.\n',
        paragraph4: 'During our collaboration stage, we can provide assistance on training period but also on\n' +
            'competitions.\n',
        paragraph5: 'We are available to support our partners anywhere across the globe.\n',
        paragraph6: 'At INSPIR PERFORMANCE, our idea is to offer athletes real help in all situations that may\n' +
            'disturb them.',
        image: image1,
        path: '/ourServicesGlobalPartnership',
    },
    {
        title: 'ATHLETE PERFORMANCE DEVELOPMENT',
        paragraph1: 'We have developed mental strategies for athletes in their quest of optimal performance.\n',
        paragraph2: 'These allows the athlete to identify his weaknesses, to correct it in order to build an\n' +
            'optimal performance system and being part of the team efficiently.\n',
        paragraph3: 'We support athletes adaptation to mental exercises through training in different strategies.\n',
        paragraph4: 'We offer to our athletes an intuitive development plan with an easy access and usage.\n',
        paragraph5: 'Each situation being different, this plan is “tailor-made” only for the athlete and adapted to\n' +
            'his needs and necessities. ',
        image: image2,
        path: '/ourServicesAthletePerformance',
    },
    {
        title: 'EXECUTIVE SUPPORT',
        paragraph1: 'Helping executive to manage the different obligations of a professional club or a professional' +
            ' organisation is an important point in access to an optimal performance.\n',
        image: image3,
        path: '/ourServicesExecutiveSupport',
        paragraph2: 'Executive managers has to build a strategy based on the athletes needs and develop\n' +
            'mental stages, and also the organisational and social context of the sporting program.\n',
        paragraph3: 'They need, as well, to develop strong relationships between all members of the club.\n',
        paragraph4: 'We try to provide all possible keys to the executive and all of the tools that can help the\n' +
            'organisation to become a Unique entity. ',
    },
    {
        title: 'TEAM AND ORGANISATION SUPPORT',
        paragraph1: 'Our experts understands dynamic of championship teams and have the skills, knowledge and' +
            ' experience to help you develop yours.\n',
        image: image4,
        path: '/ourServicesTeamAndOrganisation',
        paragraph2: 'Our systems are developed in collaboration with staffs in order to understand the situation\n' +
            'correctly and to treat it with accuracy and competence.\n',
        paragraph3: 'Our research is oriented to bring new dynamics and positive cycles for teams and\n' +
            'organisations but also for staffs and medical staffs.\n',
        paragraph4: 'Establishing a team ramp up dynamic is our main objective to match up with the club\n' +
            'objective.\n',
        paragraph5: 'Our mental training programs are designed to achieve performance improvement and an\n' +
            'optimal feeling of well-being for the athlete. ',
    }
];

export { SERVICES_DATA };
